summary: Provides utilities to launch, monitor, and clean up external processes. It encapsulates single-process control with start, log streaming, timeout handling, and termination, and aggregates multiple such controllers to run commands synchronously or asynchronously within a context manager, ensuring proper resource cleanup and interrupt handling.
